content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md::AbstractString)
    lines = split(md, "\n")  # Split the markdown into lines
    codeblocks = []  # To store our extracted julia code blocks

    for line in lines
        if startswith(line, "```julia")
            push!(codeblocks, "")  # Start of a new block. Add an empty string to codeblocks
        elseif isempty(line) && length(codeblocks) > 0 && !isempty(codeblocks[end])
            continue  # Skip the blank lines between blocks
        else
            push!(codeblocks[end], line)  # Add line to last block
        end
    end

    join([join(lines, "\n") for lines in codeblocks]; sep="\n")
end
```
